peripheral.title: USART
peripheral.help_text:
A USART (Universal Synchronous/Asynchronous Receiver/Transmitter) is a type
of a serial interface device that can be programmed to communicate asynchronously or
synchronously.

peripheral.title: USART
peripheral.help_text:
A USART (Universal Synchronous/Asynchronous Receiver/Transmitter) is a type
of a serial interface device that can be programmed to communicate asynchronously or
synchronously.

peripheral.title: USART
peripheral.help_text:
A USART (Universal Synchronous/Asynchronous Receiver/Transmitter) is a type
of a serial interface device that can be programmed to communicate asynchronously or
synchronously.

link.index: Universal synchronous asynchronous receiver transmitter (USART1, USART2, USART3, USART6 and UART4, UART5, UART7, UART8)
